faq.question: What's included in the API?
faq.answer: Full access to all summarization features: bullet points, executive summaries, detailed analysis, chat/Q&A, OCR, batch processing, and more.

faq.question: How is API usage priced?
faq.answer: Pro plan includes 500 API calls/month. Team plan includes 5,000 calls/month. Additional calls are $0.10 per summary. Volume discounts available.

faq.question: Is there a free tier for testing?
faq.answer: Yes! All plans include API access. Free plan gets 10 API calls/month for testing. Upgrade when ready for production.

faq.question: What's the rate limit?
faq.answer: Pro: 100 requests/minute. Team: 1,000 requests/minute. Enterprise: Custom limits. All plans include burst capacity.

faq.question: Do you have SDKs or just REST API?
faq.answer: We provide official SDKs for JavaScript, Python, Ruby, PHP, and Go. Plus comprehensive REST API docs for any language.

faq.question: How do webhooks work?
faq.answer: Register a webhook URL and we'll POST to it when processing completes. Perfect for async workflows with long documents.

faq.question: What's the SLA for API uptime?
faq.answer: 99.9% uptime SLA for Pro and Team plans. Enterprise plans get 99.99% SLA with dedicated infrastructure.

faq.question: Can I process documents asynchronously?
faq.answer: Yes! Submit documents and receive a job ID. Poll for completion or use webhooks for notifications.
